SEARCH
Package tradedatacorp.smelter.filesmelter

Interface FileSmelterStateful<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of a single data instance this smelter processes.
All Superinterfaces:
FileSmelter<T>, Smelter<T>, SmelterStateful<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
OHLCV_BinaryLexicalFileSmelter, OHLCV_BinaryLexicalSmallFileSmelter
public interface FileSmelterStateful<T> extends FileSmelter<T>
The purpose of this interface is to behave as a file writing stream to save files.

  • Method Details

    • smeltToFile

      void smeltToFile(T rawDataElement)
      Processes a single data element. The file location is handled by the state of implementing class.
      Parameters:
      rawDataElement - the data element to process

    • smeltToFile

      void smeltToFile(T[] rawDataArray)
      Processes an array of data elements. The file location is handled by the state of implementing class.
      Parameters:
      rawDataArray - the array of data elements to process

    • smeltToFile

      void smeltToFile(Collection<T> rawDataCollection)
      Processes a collection of data elements. The file location is handled by the state of implementing class.
      Parameters:
      rawDataCollection - the collection of data elements to process

    • smeltToFile

      void smeltToFile(Path destinationPathName)
      Save the data to a specified location. The data is handled by the state of implementing class.
      Parameters:
      destinationPathName - The full or relative path and name of file to save to.

    • smeltToFile

      void smeltToFile()
      Save data to a location. The data and file location is handled by the state of implementing class.
